record.jsxtip: Fires when the wizard has received a 'Next' request from a WizardNextButton. Should evaluate to the name of the next panel to go to, or 'NONE' to veto advancement to the next panel. Evaluate to null to advance to the next child WizardPanel of the Wizard.

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the current WizardPanel.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the wizard has received a 'Prev' request from a WizardPrevButton. Should evaluate to the name of the prev panel to go to, or 'NONE' to veto return to a prev panel. This allows to jump back multiple panels if necessary. Evaluate to null to return to the last WizardPanel visited.

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the current WizardPanel.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the wizard has received a 'Finish' request from a WizardFinishButton. Called on every child WizardPanel. Allows the panels to define what happens to it's content when a 'Finish' request is made.

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the current WizardPanel.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the wizard has received a 'Cancel' request from a WizardFinishButton. Called on every child WizardPanel. Allows the panels to define what happens when a 'Cancel' request is made (cleanup, etc.).

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the current WizardPanel.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the wizard has received a 'Revert' request from a WizardRevertButton. Called on every child WizardPanel. Allows the panels to define what happens when a 'Revert' request is made (back to last status,etc.).

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the current WizardPanel.

record.jsxtip: Fires from the wizard when a generic WizardNavButton is clicked. Called on every child WizardPanel. Allows the panels to define what happens for a particular button click. Use the objBUTTON and strCURRENTPANEL objects to determine if this button click is relevant to this panel's context.

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the current WizardPanel.

record.jsxtip: Fires just before the wizard shows this WizardPanel.

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that caused this panel-switch.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the WizardPanel being hidden.

record.jsxtip: Fires just after the wizard hides this WizardPanel.

record.jsxtext: the wizard object that publishes this event.
the wizard button object that caused this panel-switch.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the name of the WizardPanel about to be shown.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the user drags this block. Canceling this event prevents the drag from occurring.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the type of drag (JSXDragType).
the id of the dragged element (JSXDragId).
the HTML element acted upon.
Key Down
record.jsxtip: Fires after a browser keydown event when this block has focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user clicks this block.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user double-clicks this block.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user drops an object on this block.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the object where the drag begins.
the type of drag (JSXDragType).
the id of the dragged element (JSXDragId).
the HTML element acted upon.
Ctrl Drop
record.jsxtip: Fires after the user drops an object on this block while pressing the Ctrl key.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the object where the drag begins.
the type of drag (JSXDragTyp).e
the id of the dragged element (JSXDragId).
the HTML element acted upon.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user hovers the mouse over this block and before the spyglass displays. The event script must evaluate to the HTML content to display in the spyglass. Canceling this event prevents the spyglass from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this block and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.
record.jsxtext: the menu to display.
Before Move
record.jsxtip: Fires when the user depresses the mouse button on this movable block. Canceling this event prevents this block from moving.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
set to true if only vertical movement allowed. For example: o = {bCONSTRAINX:true};
set to true if only horizontal movement allowed. For example: o = {bCONSTRAINY:true};
After Move
record.jsxtip: Fires when the user releases the mouse button after moving this block across the screen.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this block is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this block before it is removed from the DOM.
